alert.note: Alert for Lower St. Mary; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:46PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Mary Parish through 415 PM CDT... At 346 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Baldwin, or near Franklin. The strong thunderstorm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Baldwin, Sorrel, Glencoe, and Charenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower St. Mary; Upper St. Mary
